long_description: Perfect for backpacking, the Kelty TraiLogic PDsi Sleeping Pad incorporates strategically placed insulation that maps to the human form while simultaneously reducing weight and bulk. R-value equals 3.6; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (highly insulated). 50-denier micro ripstop polyester resists abrasion and punctures. Pad fits easily into the included stuff sack that packs flat to save space inside your backpack. Kelty TraiLogic PDsi Sleeping Pad comes with a repair kit.
short_description: Perfect for backpacking, the Kelty TraiLogic PDsi Sleeping Pad incorporates strategically placed insulation that maps to the human form while simultaneously reducing weight and bulk.
